Publication Title: Transport Barriers Influence the Activation of Anti-Tumor Immunity: A Systems Biology Analysis
Publication Keywords: Radiotherapy, Anti-tumor immunity, Immune Activation, T Cell Trafficking, Tumor-induced Antigen
Publication Authors: Mohammad R Nikmaneshi, James W Baish, Hengbo Zhou, Timothy P Padera, Lance L Munn
Publication Abstract: Effective anti-cancer immune responses require activation of one or more naïve T cells. If the correct naïve T cell encounters its cognate antigen presented by an antigen presenting cell, then the T cell can activate and proliferate.
